summary: This is an FBI email containing a draft operational plan for the arrest of Ghislaine Maxwell. The email requests review and forwarding to ASAC Creasey for final approval.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Subject of the draft arrest operational plan (OPLAN) attached to the email.

persons.name: Creasey
persons.context: The individual to whom the approved OPLAN should be forwarded for final approval.

connections.description: Creasey, as an ASAC, is involved in the approval process for the operational plan to arrest Maxwell.

events.title: Draft Arrest OPLAN for Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: An FBI operational plan for the arrest of Ghislaine Maxwell is drafted and circulated for review and approval.

keyFacts: A draft FBI operational plan (OPLAN) for the arrest of Ghislaine Maxwell was created on June 30, 2020.
The plan required review and final approval from ASAC Creasey.
The email indicates a high level of importance and coordination within the FBI regarding Maxwell's impending arrest.
